The Fusion House, 246, Block C4F, Janakpuri, New Delhi, Delhi 110058

Kartoon Cafe is one of kind cafe who Offers A Delicious And Multi-Cuisine To Provide A Expert Culinary Experience For Our Customers. Our Promoters Have Extensively Experience of Around The World And they are expert in Refined Understanding Of Food and quality. and on behalf of that experience they developed kartoon cafe recipes for our Valuable customers.
